content: AlphaBay Multi-Vendor ScriptAvailable for SaleAlphaBay Script is clean, updated, and based on modern Laravel 10.8, HTML5, and Bootstrap. We managed and updated this script to give you a smooth user experience as you manage your shop. You can use this script to sell all kinds of products. With these and more features, AlphaBay Script will make your market a world-beater.This is highly customizable – looks awesome on tablets and mobile devices. We have included best practices of web development – you can create a great market layout based on Bootstrap.Key Features:Future updates and Support included.Multi-Vendor ScriptFree InstallationLaravel 10.8 - The PHP Framework for Web Artisans. Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax.Bootstrap 5.x Framework: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML and CSS framework for developing responsive, mobile-first projects on the web.Full eCommerce features.Bitcoin + Monero + Litecoin Payment GatewayEscrow Payment SystemOptimised, Pentested, and SecureRequirements:Apache, NGINX, or any compatible Web ServerPHP 8.1 or HigherMySQL Database serverBitcoin, Monero, and Litecoin Core NodesFileinfo PHP ExtensionGMP PHP ExtensionCron Job compatible AppContact: Contact for Demo, queries, and price.Telegram: @DeSnakeSTelegram Link: https://t.me/DeSnakeSEmail: the.desnake@protonmail.comThank You
